newsitem.title: USA: Commercial Risk gets "A" rating from A.M. Best.
newsitem.headline: Commercial Risk gets "A" rating from A.M. Best.

text.p: A.M. Best Co, an insurer rating service, said on Monday it has assigned a group rating of "A" (Excellent) to Commercial Risk Reinsurance Co Ltd and Commercial Risk Re-Insurance Co.

The group rating is based on the companies' affiliated marketing, technical and underwriting strategies, capitalization, geographically diversified business, operating earnings and capitalization, A.M. Best said.
The group's strategy is to provide specialty and finite capacity to key business partners, primary insurers and commercial and industrial insureds, A.M. Best said.
A. M. Best said it views the group's outlook as stable and believes it is well positioned to continue to be a lead provider of alternative risk management capacity to the global marketplace.
